root: ^Olly "the Slyboots", a local street urchin, runs out from the corner when you leave the apartments:
^"Hey ho, lady-snoop! Going out to find more bloody cultist to have fun with?"
^"Get lost, Olly! I don't have time for you, go kill some cats or whatever"
^"But what if Olly has a priceless information for the lady-snoop?"
^"About this Death Flowers cult you've been asking everybody about for the last century!"
^"But I still have nothing in my pockets, and it is dinner time soon."

convince: ^"Not playing it. If you do have something to share, do it now - you may save lives, kid!"
^"Oh, I'm not a bloody doctor to save lives, I'm hungry! The worst of luck, lady-snoop!"
^Olly waves his hand and runs away
threat: ^"Olly, If you do have a lead, share it now, or I'll come back with a constable in five minutes!"
^"Easy now, lady-snoop, I thought we were friends... Search the Merchant District - all I can say."
pay: ^"I'm long enough in the business to be cautious with you, mister Slyboots. Prove me that you really have something, and only then I'll pay!"
^"Wow, the lady-snoop took some "clever pills" today. Okay, does the name of Alfonso Alvarez rings a bell?"
^"Fine, Olly, now you have my full attention. Where have you heard about him?"
^"The man has a hideout in the Merchant District. Search for him there."
threat2: ^"That's it Olly!? Give me something more specific, or prepare to hide from constables for a week!"
^"Olly doesn't respond well to threats, lady-snoop! See ya around!"
^Olly waves his hand and runs away
bye: ^"Well, Olly, that's not much, but it is something. Stay safe, dirty little rascal!"
^"And you, lady-snoop! It is some dark times we're having now..."
^Olly waves his hand and runs away
flatter: ^"Thank you, Olly. But I don't believe that a clever guy like you know only the district's name..."
^"Well, lady-snoop, only because you are my friend - it's West Main Street. But you didn't heard it from me!"
^Olly waves his hand and runs away
